fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: Subtract from a player at night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
The role effects of all players visiting them tonight will be delayed by one night.
All notifications related to them will also be delayed by one night.
This includes notifications they receive, others receive from visiting them, or anything that is the result of something they did.
The faction will gain points equal to the amount of effects and notifications delayed.
